ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(FS_FC_Type__c,'File Upload Flavor Change'), AND( NOT($Profile.Name='System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name='FET System Admin')), OR( ISCHANGED(FS_AC__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Description__c), ISCHANGED(FS_PM__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Entering_COM__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Approved__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Requested_Date__c), ISCHANGED(FS_SP_Readiness__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Add_Flavor_Change_Notes_Comments__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Pay_Type__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Product_Order_handled_By_txt__c), ISCHANGED(Is_customer_switching_back_to_DirectShip__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Customer_Readiness__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Project_Id__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Project_Name__c), ISCHANGED(FS_Estimated_FC_Date__c) ),!FS_isBatch__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have sufficient access to update a record created through the file upload option. Please request help of your FET help support member
